Instructions

In this survey, you will read and listen to a series of sentences. For each sentence, you'll first see a screen telling you to get ready. This screen will show the sentence you are about to hear. Familiarize yourself with the sentence before moving on. Here is what the "get ready" screen will look like:

When you're ready to hear the sentence, press the spacebar. You will immediately hear the sentence and see a screen that looks like this:
